pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of Stone$() is a useful tool for placing blocks created by water and lava fluid interactions.$(br2)The sigil has three modes that can be cycled through using [$(k:sneak)] + [$(k:use)]:$(li)Cobblestone$(li)Stone$(li)Obsidian

Using [$(k:use)] on a surface in the world will place the specified block into the world and drain $(blood)LP$() from the bound player's Soul Network.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$()$(li)Cobblestone: $(blood)50 LP$()/use$(li)Stone: $(blood)150 LP$()/use$(li)Obsidian: $(blood)1,500 LP$()/use
